**Diagnostic Scan Tools**
================================

### Announcement
#### Tender ID: WS4117783778; Amendment Number: 2
#### Date Published: August 21, 2023; Closing Date: September 11, 2023

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to provide diagnostic scan tools for the Department of National Defence (DND).

### Key Information

* **Contract Period:** Expected Start Date: October 2, 2023; Expected End Date: April 1, 2029
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding; **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), and others
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Allison Fernandez (SPAC/PSPC); Email: [allison.fernandez@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:allison.fernandez@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Request for Proposal:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17222570?extsite=MTcyMjI1NzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17222570?extsite=MTcyMjI1NzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Tender Description

PSPC seeks bidders to provide diagnostic scan tools to diagnose various vehicle types. The following quantities are required:

* 25 Automotive diagnostic scan tools
* 10 Commercial Heavy-Duty Class diagnostic scan tools
* 5 Electric Vehicle diagnostic scan tools

The tools must allow for software updates for five years. Mandatory technical criteria must be clearly demonstrated; failure to comply will result in the offer being deemed non-responsive.

Please note that the response deadline has been amended; bids must be submitted by September 11, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT to be considered. Any submissions made after this time will be non-responsive.

### UN/HS Codes

* 25190000 - Transportation services equipment
* 27000000 - Tools and General Machinery
* 27110000 - Hand tools
* 27140000 - Automotive specialty tools

### Categorization

* Procurement Category: Goods
* Procurement
